item.title: Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I’d be glad to:

[php]function Duel: Boolean;
begin
if ((SimilarColors(5330261, GetColor(312, 221), 5)) and
(SimilarColors(3358280, GetColor(419, 153), 5)) and
(SimilarColors(3358280, GetColor(141, 309), 5))) then
Result := True
else
Result := False;
end;[/php]

There ya go,

Color Picked: 3358280 at (141, 309)

item.title: Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I thought your Duel function did that?

If your having problems with that procedure, you could try something like this:

[php]function Duel: Boolean;
begin
if ((SimilarColors(CheckColor1, GetColor(?, ?), Tolerance)) and
(SimilarColors(CheckColor2, GetColor(?, ?), Tolerance)) and
(SimilarColors(CheckColor3, GetColor(?, ?), Tolerance))) then
Result := True
else
Result := False;
end;[/php]

Just replace the CheckColors with 3 different colors on the duel screen, and the ?'s with the coordinates of the corresponding color, and the tolerance with the tolerance you want to use ( I suggest about 3-5 ).

Read full topic

item.title: Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, what do you want the script to do? I’m guessing you want it to try to open the duel screen by accepting duel offers?

So, from the looks of it, your GetDuel procedure will accept offers ( The FindColor part ) so all you should have to do is call GetDuel to open the duel screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions!
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

I cant figure out what your saying lol. Anyways here the script, can you see what you can do?

[php]
{If i forgot you in credits PM me on villu-reborn.com and i will add you.
Credits:
Boreas/Yakman for the chat coords
Junior for the DuelScreen help}
Program DuelTrainer;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

function Duel: boolean;
begin
if (getcolor(244,290)=(0)) Then
result:= true
else
result:=false
end;

Procedure GetDuel;
Begin
Repeat
TypeSend(‘Funning all’);
If (findcolorTolerance(x, y, 12926 , MCX1, MCY1, MCX2, MCY2, 25)) Then
Begin
MMouse(x, y, 3, 3);
Mouse(x,y,3,3, True);
Duel;
End;
Until(Duel)
End;

Procedure Accept1;
Begin
If (findcolorTolerance(x, y, 32768 , MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2, 25)) Then
Begin
MMouse(x, y, 3, 3);
Mouse(x, y, 3, 3, True);
End;
End;

Begin
SetupSRL;
ActivateClient;
Repeat
GetDuel;
Accept1;
Until(False);
End.[/php]

Read full topic

@Weibs wrote:

Just needed some extra parentheses:

function duelscreen: boolean;
begin
if ((getcolor(61,68)=(2263210)) and
(getcolor(310,280)=(128)) and
(getcolor(228,281)=(32768)))Then
result:= true
else
result:=false
end;
